snippet: A federal appeals court removed a temporary ban on domestic horse slaughter, clearing the way for companies in New Mexico, Missouri and Iowa to open while an appeal proceeds.
abstract: Federal appeals court removes temporary ban on domestic horse slaughter, clearing way for companies in New Mexico, Missouri and Iowa to open while appeal from lawsuit by animal protection groups proceeds.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court removed a temporary ban on domestic horse slaughter, clearing the way for companies in New Mexico, Missouri and Iowa to open while an appeal proceeds.

headline.main: Court Lifts Injunction on Horse Slaughter Plants
headline.print_headline: Court Lifts Injunction on Horse Slaughter Plants

keywords.value: Humane Society of the United States
keywords.name: organizations
